To bring optimal user experience, FeelVibe requires certain permissions to operate. File access permission is required to read local file music.

I have read and agree to the terms & conditions and the privacy policy.
Welcome to FeelVibe, a music streaming and social media app ("the App") provided by FeelVibe, Inc. By using the App, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions:

Terms and Conditions 
Welcome to FeelVibe, a music streaming and social media app ("the App") provided by FeelVibe, Inc. By using the App, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions:



Use of the App 

a. The App is intended for personal use only. You may use the App to stream music, connect with friends, and share content, provided that you comply with these terms and conditions. 

b. You may not use the App for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, including but not limited to copyright infringement, harassment, or distribution of malicious software. 

c. The Company reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms and conditions.



User Content 

a. The App allows you to upload, share, and comment on user-generated content, such as music tracks, playlists, photos, and videos. 

b. You retain ownership of any content that you upload to the App. However, by uploading content, you grant the Company a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual, and irrevocable license to use, reproduce, distribute, and display your content in connection with the App. 

c. You are solely responsible for the content that you upload to the App, and you represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights to grant the license described in section 2(b) above. 

d. The Company reserves the right to remove any content that violates these terms and conditions or that is deemed inappropriate by the Company.



Intellectual Property 

a. The App and all content contained therein, including but not limited to music, artwork, and trademarks, are owned by the Company or its licensors. 

b. You may not use any content from the App without the express written permission of the Company.



Privacy 

a. The Company collects and uses personal information in accordance with its privacy policy, which can be found in the Privacy Policy below. 

b. By using the App, you consent to the Company's collection and use of your personal information as described in the privacy policy.



Disclaimers and Limitations of Liability 

a. The App is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. 

b. The Company does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content on the App. 

c. To the fullest extent permitted by law, the Company disclaims all liability for any damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the App.



Governing Law 

a. These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Constitution of the Philippines. 

b. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these terms and conditions shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of the Constitution of the Philippines. 

By using the App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, you may not use the App.




Privacy Policy 
This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how FeelVibe, Inc ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and discloses personal information in connection with our music streaming and social media app ("the App"). By using the App, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Policy.



Information We Collect 

a. Information you provide: When you create an account on the App, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and profile picture. We may also collect information that you provide when you use the App, such as your music preferences and playlists. 

b. Information we collect automatically: When you use the App, we may automatically collect certain information, such as your IP address, device type, and operating system. We may also collect information about your use of the App, such as the music tracks you listen to, the content you upload, and your interactions with other users.



Use of Information 

a. We may use your personal information to: 

 •Provide and improve the App; 

 •Communicate with you about the App and your account; 

 •Analyze usage trends and improve the App's features and functionality; 

 •Detect and prevent fraud and other illegal activities; 

 •Comply with legal obligations. 

b. We may use information that does not personally identify you, such as aggregated usage data, for any purpose.



Sharing of Information 

a. We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who help us operate the App, such as hosting providers and payment processors. 

b. We may also share your personal information with other users of the App to facilitate social interactions, such as sharing playlists and commenting on content. 

c. We may disclose your personal information if required by law or in response to a legal request, such as a subpoena or court order. 

d. We may disclose your personal information to enforce our policies, protect our rights or property, or protect the safety of our users or others.



Security 

a. We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. 

b. However, we cannot guarantee the security of your personal information, and you use the App at your own risk.



International Transfers 

a. We may transfer your personal information to countries outside of your own, including to the United States. 

b. If we transfer your personal information to a country that does not provide an adequate level of data protection, we will take appropriate measures to ensure that your personal information is protected in accordance with applicable data protection laws.



Your Rights 

a. You may have certain rights with respect to your personal information, such as the right to access, rectify, and erase your personal information. 

b. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at feelvibeplayer@gmail.com.



Changes to this Policy 

a. We may update this Policy from time to time. 

b. If we make material changes to this Policy, we will notify you by email or by posting a notice on the App. 

c. By continuing to use the App after any changes to this Policy, you agree to the updated Policy. 

If you have any questions or concerns about this Policy, please contact us at feelvibeplayer@gmail.com.
